name: Attack of Walking Killer Dead Zombie-s (Temple Plague High-way Road Run) - Free Shooter Game
name_original: Attack of Walking Killer Dead Zombie-s (Temple Plague High-way Road Run) - Free Shooter Game
description:
It's survival or be eaten by zombies!
Help these brave temple explorers escape from these hungry zombies in this epic adventure! Countless hours of fun and excitement!

Your objectives:
-Take down the incoming zombies!
-Collect coins to unlock new and cool characters!
-Avoid boulder traps!

Grab this game while it is still FREE!
